item.description:
Well with winter over it's time to start the dances up again.  This year I hope to have more venues and if you have any suggestions let me know.  Also if you have any other ideas that you think the group would like don't hesitate in setting up an event.  We'll be having the regular monthly dances in Malden, which is just north of Boston and a great hall, with a good friendly crowd having a fun time every month.  With all the groups that post this dance, it is always a good crowd.  I am also trying to consolidate into one.  Look at WhatsAngeloDoing and sign up on that one too.  Hope to see you at the next event.

Angelo
item.name: Newburyport Singles 30's 40's and 50's
